answers.answer: My answer must be yes ..in my opinion the child is dehydrated and will need a drip ..has she been drinking at all .? take her ASAP to the hospital where they will hydrate her and test her sugar levels ...good luck let us know how she is doing .

I think you should take her back to ER . I would also be worried I cant believe they just sent you home.I also thought diabetes  did they check for this especially since dr mentioned it?I would also be worried that she is dehydrated is she drinking lots of fluids? if she is then where is it going?please keep me updated i know when are kids are sick its so hard. I would take her back to Dr today Tonight and Not wait like dr said.i am sending a prayer for you and for your Granddaughter please keep us updated

question: My 19 month old granddaighter hasnt relly urinated in two days took her to the foctor today and they would not even really check her out after I told them the symptoms.  After begging and pleading with them they catherized her and her urine had a protein level of 101 and they sent me home. told me to try and track her urin through the night and come back tommorrow.  I am very upset and my daughter is just puzzled.  The only thing the doctor mentioned was her being a diabetic.  What does this mean can someone please give us answers.  Ithas been 4 hrs since we left the doctors and she still has not urinated.  Should I taker her to our pediatric hospital.  I am scared..
title: 19 month old grandaighter with HIGH protein in Urine.
